name: FLOWZ
description: The Flowz app is a comprehensive tool tailored for investors in the Saudi market who seek efficient and easy monitoring of their dividend stock investments. By simply entering your investment data, Flowz automatically tracks all your dividend payments and offers precise, detailed analytics. This enables you to gain deeper insights into the performance of your investments. With Flowz, you can make informed decisions to boost your dividend income, ensuring that your financial growth is both smart and strategic.

name: MAMBU LTD
description: Mambu is a SaaS, cloud-native, API-driven platform designed to power financial innovation. It enables institutions to bring solutions to market faster, break down cost barriers, and expand ecosystems. With a customer base spanning fintech startups, telcos, and top-tier banks, Mambu empowers over 101 million end users globally.Mambu’s mission is to empower a diverse range of financial professionals, including developers, architects, business analysts, and innovators. Businesses collaborate with Mambu’s platform, teams, and services to create exceptional banking experiences for millions of customers worldwide—whether they’re entrepreneurs in NYC, farmers in Kenya, or SMEs in Brazil.

name: Dyna.Ai Pte. Ltd.

These capabilities enable us to deliver top-tier AI solutions that empower our clients to achieve business success and maintain a competitive edge in a rapidly evolving market.

At Dyna.Ai, we are committed to delivering AI-driven solutions that are pivotal in enhancing system operations, improving customer acquisition and activation, optimizing risk management, boosting operational productivity, and reducing costs.


Mission: Empower Work, Enrich Life

name: Payermax
description: PayerMax is a leading global fintech company deeply rooted in emerging markets, especially in the MENA region, with a global business footprint. It is committed to delivering professional omni-method global payment solutions. PayerMax offers merchants a comprehensive range of services, including global acquiring, payout, collections, and treasury management, providing a safer and more convenient one-stop payment platform experience. PayerMax boasts an impressive coverage rate of nearly 95% for mainstream payment methods in emerging markets. It is the first Asian fintech company to obtain the UAE's payment license and also the first Asian fintech company to set up a regional headquarters in the MENA region, specifically in Saudi Arabia. Additionally, PayerMax is among the first companies selected for the National Technology Development Program (NTDP) initiated by the Ministry of Communications and Information Technology (MCIT) in Saudi Arabia. PayerMax has set up five local offices in the MENA region, including Saudi Arabia, Abu Dhabi, Dubai, Kuwait, and Bahrain. In the future, we will further enhance our presence and investments in the MENA region, providing even better products for merchants in the area.
htmlDescription:
PayerMax is a leading global fintech company deeply rooted in emerging markets, especially in the MENA region, with a global business footprint. It is committed to delivering professional omni-method global payment solutions. PayerMax offers merchants a comprehensive range of services, including global acquiring, payout, collections, and treasury management, providing a safer and more convenient one-stop payment platform experience.

PayerMax boasts an impressive coverage rate of nearly 95% for mainstream payment methods in emerging markets. It is the first Asian fintech company to obtain the UAE's payment license and also the first Asian fintech company to set up a regional headquarters in the MENA region, specifically in Saudi Arabia. Additionally, PayerMax is among the first companies selected for the National Technology Development Program (NTDP) initiated by the Ministry of Communications and Information Technology (MCIT) in Saudi Arabia.

PayerMax has set up five local offices in the MENA region, including Saudi Arabia, Abu Dhabi, Dubai, Kuwait, and Bahrain. In the future, we will further enhance our presence and investments in the MENA region, providing even better products for merchants in the area.

name: The Lending Hub
description: The Lending Hub is a peer-to-peer crowdfunding platform that aims to provide underbanked borrowers with quick access to alternative funding options. We have created an online marketplace that connects these borrowers with a diverse crowd of lenders who are looking to diversify their investment portfolios by investing in small-ticket loans.Through our innovative platform, we facilitate the efficient and transparent exchange of funds, creating a win-win situation for both borrowers and lenders.
htmlDescription:
The Lending Hub is a peer-to-peer crowdfunding platform that aims to provide underbanked borrowers with quick access to alternative funding options. We have created an online marketplace that connects these borrowers with a diverse crowd of lenders who are looking to diversify their investment portfolios by investing in small-ticket loans.

Through our innovative platform, we facilitate the efficient and transparent exchange of funds, creating a win-win situation for both borrowers and lenders.

name: ECOVIS AL SABTI
description: ECOVIS Al Sabti, in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, is a member firm of the ECOVIS International network. ECOVIS is a leading global consulting firm rooted in Continental Europe, operates across more than 95 countries with a team of 11000 professionals. The firm provides a range of professional services including Audit and Assurance, Financial Advisory, Risk Management, Cybersecurity, Business Continuity Management, Data Management & Data Privacy, Technology Consulting, Governance, Risk & Compliance, Tax Consulting, and Accounting Services to clients in various industries.ECOVIS is devoted to delivering top-quality, tailored solutions to clients, utilizing its global network of experts and local market insights to assist clients in achieving their business goals. ECOVIS is renowned for its innovative client service approach and dedication to excellence.A distinctive feature of ECOVIS is their ability to combine personalized advice at the local level with the comprehensive expertise of a diverse global network of professionals.
htmlDescription:
ECOVIS Al Sabti, in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, is a member firm of the ECOVIS International network. The firm provides a range of professional services including Audit and Assurance, Financial Advisory, Risk Management, Cybersecurity, Business Continuity Management, Data Management & Data Privacy, Technology Consulting, Governance, Risk & Compliance, Tax Consulting, and Accounting Services to clients in various industries.

ECOVIS is devoted to delivering top-quality, tailored solutions to clients, utilizing its global network of experts and local market insights to assist clients in achieving their business goals. ECOVIS is renowned for its innovative client service approach and dedication to excellence.

A distinctive feature of ECOVIS is their ability to combine personalized advice at the local level with the comprehensive expertise of a diverse global network of professionals.

name: Moyasar Financial Company

Our mission is to empower clients with the tools they need to make critical decisions confidently. Through our cutting-edge AI-powered products and solutions, we offer transformative capabilities that drive success in today's dynamic landscape.At the heart of our offerings is FOCAL, a powerful tool designed specifically to combat money laundering and ensure compliance. Additionally, we present OSOS, our state-of-the-art AI solution meticulously crafted to navigate the intricate nuances of the Arabic language.Headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, Mozn extends its reach with a strategic office in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. name: Penny Software
description: Penny Software is an AI-powered, cloud-based Source-To-Pay solution that features a modular system for rapid implementation and ease of use. With Penny, businesses can completely digitize and streamline their entire procurement cycle, from Purchase Requisitions and Approvals to RFQs, RFPs, RFIs, and the analysis and comparison of quotations and proposals. The platform also manages Purchase Orders, Goods Received Notes, and payments. It includes robust modules for vendor, contract, spend, and budget management, all enhanced by AI to optimize decision-making and efficiency. This comprehensive system allows for full procurement tracking, advanced reporting, and detailed analysis, empowering organizations to enhance their procurement processes and strategic insights.
htmlDescription: Penny Software is an AI-powered, cloud-based Source-To-Pay solution that features a modular system for rapid implementation and ease of use. With Penny, businesses can completely digitize and streamline their entire procurement cycle, from Purchase Requisitions and Approvals to RFQs, RFPs, RFIs, and the analysis and comparison of quotations and proposals. The platform also manages Purchase Orders, Goods Received Notes, and payments. It includes robust modules for vendor, contract, spend, and budget management, all enhanced by AI to optimize decision-making and efficiency. This comprehensive system allows for full procurement tracking, advanced reporting, and detailed analysis, empowering organizations to enhance their procurement processes and strategic insights.

name: ZAVFIT
description: ZavFit is revolutionising the FinTech x HealthTech space with their ZavFit app and ground-breaking financial wellbeing metric, Happiness Per Pound™. Designed by scientists, the app is proven to significantly reduce people’s money stress in just 2 weeks.Poor mental health is at a crisis point globally, putting immense pressure on healthcare systems and on businesses with spikes in employee absence rates and declining performance. Money stress is the leading cause of poor mental health.Using Open Banking and principles from Cognitive Behavioural Therapy and Behaviour Change, ZavFit helps people gain control over their spending, improves money habits, and reduces stress.
htmlDescription:
ZavFit is revolutionising the FinTech x HealthTech space with their ZavFit app and ground-breaking financial wellbeing metric, Happiness Per Pound™. Designed by scientists, the app is proven to significantly reduce people’s money stress in just 2 weeks.

Poor mental health is at a crisis point globally, putting immense pressure on healthcare systems and on businesses with spikes in employee absence rates and declining performance. Money stress is the leading cause of poor mental health.

Using Open Banking and principles from Cognitive Behavioural Therapy and Behaviour Change, ZavFit helps people gain control over their spending, improves money habits, and reduces stress.

name: Lean Technologies Saudi for Information Technology Company
description: Lean Technologies is the sole Open Banking aggregator that is regulated and operational in the UAE and KSA. Lean provides the most cutting edge Open Banking APIs and services with the purpose of allowing clients to connect to their customers bank accounts, retrieve vital financial data and initiate bank to bank payments via a simple one time integration. Lean was founded in 2019 and became operational with its first clients in 2021, and has grown to more than 180 clients on boarded across the region with over 500,000 connected customer accounts via its platform.

name: Valify Solutions
description: Valify is an Egyptian Reg-tech developer of identity verification solutions. Our cutting-edge AI technology will ease access to services for individuals and help businesses automate their operations and identity validation processes, as well as help Egypt reach its financial inclusion goals. Valify’s services are the first Egyptian in-house-built model, giving it the capabilities to be tailored to the Egyptian market needs.We assist organizations in automating their onboarding processes and meeting regulatory compliance requirements, including KYC and AML. Our suite of services includes Optical Character Recognition (OCR), Data Validation, Facial Recognition, Liveness Detection, AML Sanction Screening, and Transliteration. By automating onboarding processes and integrating seamlessly with businesses' SDKs and APIs, Valify eliminates manual entry and physical adherence, saving valuable time and resources.
htmlDescription:
Valify is an Egyptian Reg-tech developer of identity verification solutions. Our cutting-edge AI technology will ease access to services for individuals and help businesses automate their operations and identity validation processes, as well as help Egypt reach its financial inclusion goals. Valify’s services are the first Egyptian in-house-built model, giving it the capabilities to be tailored to the Egyptian market needs.


We assist organizations in automating their onboarding processes and meeting regulatory compliance requirements, including KYC and AML. Our suite of services includes Optical Character Recognition (OCR), Data Validation, Facial Recognition, Liveness Detection, AML Sanction Screening, and Transliteration.


By automating onboarding processes and integrating seamlessly with businesses' SDKs and APIs, Valify eliminates manual entry and physical adherence, saving valuable time and resources.

name: Axiology
description: Axiology is building next generation DLT based financial securities infrastructure to make capital market access easy.Our business model adheres to established market practices across all verticals of the securities transaction cycle. While the new regime permits person-to-person trading of tokenized securities, we believe that the client-facing aspect is better handled by specialized brokers, who would be the direct users and clients of Axiology. The value proposition for brokers lies in the ability to enhance securities offerings and trading terms for their clients, potentially improving secondary market liquidity at retail-accessible transaction sizes.Axiology received 2 million euro investment in a funding round led by two venture capital funds (Baltic Sandbox Ventures and Coinvest) and private angel investors valuing the company at 7 million euro valuation. This funding will carry us through to the development of a fully functional, regulatory-compliant tokenized securities platform, positioning Axiology as one of the first, if not the first, tokenized financial securities infrastructure in the EU. Our vision is to bolster the EU capital market by reducing the cost of issuance, trading, settlement, and reporting through the use of efficient technology.Our team comprises seasoned individuals with backgrounds in regulatory affairs, banking, and the securities market, complemented by expertise in distributed ledger implementations for institutional clients. Axiology is led by an ex-central banker and supervisor who played a pivotal role in creating a payments market infrastructure that facilitated the growth of the fintech ecosystem in the region and the EU.In KSA we are looking for partners, and investors to facilitate market entry in the Kingdom.
htmlDescription:
Axiology is building next generation DLT based financial securities infrastructure to make capital market access easy.

Our business model adheres to established market practices across all verticals of the securities transaction cycle. While the new regime permits person-to-person trading of tokenized securities, we believe that the client-facing aspect is better handled by specialized brokers, who would be the direct users and clients of Axiology. The value proposition for brokers lies in the ability to enhance securities offerings and trading terms for their clients, potentially improving secondary market liquidity at retail-accessible transaction sizes.

Axiology received 2 million euro investment in a funding round led by two venture capital funds (Baltic Sandbox Ventures and Coinvest) and private angel investors valuing the company at 7 million euro valuation. This funding will carry us through to the development of a fully functional, regulatory-compliant tokenized securities platform, positioning Axiology as one of the first, if not the first, tokenized financial securities infrastructure in the EU.

Our vision is to bolster the EU capital market by reducing the cost of issuance, trading, settlement, and reporting through the use of efficient technology.

Our team comprises seasoned individuals with backgrounds in regulatory affairs, banking, and the securities market, complemented by expertise in distributed ledger implementations for institutional clients. Axiology is led by an ex-central banker and supervisor who played a pivotal role in creating a payments market infrastructure that facilitated the growth of the fintech ecosystem in the region and the EU.

In KSA we are looking for partners, and investors to facilitate market entry in the Kingdom.

name: Ejada Systems Company
description: ejada, a leading Information Technology (IT) services provider headquartered in Saudi Arabia, empowers organizations across the Middle East and Africa (MENA) to thrive in today's digital landscape. The Company helps businesses and public-sector entities achieve and maintain a competitive edge through innovative IT solutions and services specifically designed to support their digital transformation journey.With over 30 years of experience, ejada boasts a team of more than 3,500 dedicated professionals. In addition, ejada has a proven track record of success, having delivered over 800 large-scale projects for more than 500 enterprise clients. By implementing ejada's business solutions and specialized products, organizations can enhance operational efficiency, expand service offerings, and ensure regulatory compliance.

Lendo Saudi for Financing
description: Lendo is a shari’ah compliant, peer-to-peer (P2P) lending marketplace that helps to digitally pre-finance outstanding invoices for small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) in Saudi Arabia. Our finance platform is a community of creditworthy borrowers and sophisticated investors looking for alternative investments. Lendo products and solutions make everyday business activities easier, more secure and more efficient for both investors and borrowers alike. For more information please check our website www.lendo.sa

name: Fintech Saudi
description: Fintech Saudi was launched by the Saudi Central Bank in partnership with the Capital Market Authority in April 2018 to act as a catalyst for developing the financial services technology (fintech) industry in Saudi Arabia. Our vision is transforming Saudi Arabia into an innovative fintech hub with a thriving and responsible ecosystem.

name: Nium
description: Nium, the global leader in real-time, cross-border payments, was founded on the mission to deliver the global payments infrastructure of tomorrow, today. With the onset of the global economy, its payments infrastructure is shaping how banks, fintechs, and businesses everywhere collect, convert, and disburse funds instantly across borders. Its payout network supports 100 currencies and spans 220+ markets, 100 of which in real-time. Funds can be disbursed to accounts, wallets, and cards and collected locally in 35 markets. Nium's growing card issuance business is already available in 34 countries. Nium holds regulatory licences and authorizations in more than 40 countries, enabling seamless onboarding, rapid integration, and compliance – independent of geography. The company is co-headquartered in San Francisco and Singapore.
htmlDescription: Nium, the global leader in real-time, cross-border payments, was founded on the mission to deliver the global payments infrastructure of tomorrow, today.
